site_name: Trees located in communal parking area between Akerman Road, Evandale Road & Loughborough Road
description: (09P4) Ailanthus altissima - Reshape crown by no more than 0.5m to balance canopy and reduce encroachment to building in close proximity.(09P5) Ailanthus altissima - Reshape crown by no more than 0.5m to balance canopy and reduce encroachment to access road.(09P8) Ailianthis altissima - Crown lift to 3m from ground level to clear car park and pedestrian headroom.(09P9) Sorbus acuparia - Formative prune to encourage healthy crown development. This may entail reducing over extended branches by no more than 0.5m and the removal of smaller crossing or rubbing branches.(09PA) Sorbus acuparia - Formative prune to encourage healthy crown development. This may entail reducing over extended branches by no more than 0.5m and the removal of smaller crossing or rubbing branches.(09PB) Ailianthis altissima - Crown lift to 3m from ground level to clear car park and pedestrian headroom.Tree specifications attached to plan
